# Num2Devanagari
* Convert numbers to Devanagari words.


### Example Usage
```
from Num2Devanagari import Num2Word

num = 123456789
num2word = Num2Word()
word = num2word.convert(num)
print(word)
# output: "बाह्र करोड चौँतिस लाख छपन्न हजार सात सय उनान्नब्बे2
```
